EmailTemplate.name: Opt-Out notification
EmailTemplate.subject: DTW Action Required: Deliver to Win enrollment rejected by PM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Project Manager for project {!IncentiveProject__c.Name} has indicated that this project is not suitable for enrollment in the DTW incentive plan. Please click the project link to review the enrollment form for this project and determine a reason for exclusion from DTW, or proceed with enrollment of the project at your discretion.
For more information please review the Approver Resources on the DTW webpage. A short video and more information about enrollment (or rejection) of a project and how to complete the form are available.
Thank you,
DTW Administrator
{!EnrollmentPlan__c.ReplyTo__c}
